Uses of Interface
org.drip.capital.entity.CapitalSimulator

Packages that use CapitalSimulator
Package Description
org.drip.capital.entity
Economic Risk Capital Estimation Nodes

  • Uses of CapitalSimulator in org.drip.capital.entity

    Classes in org.drip.capital.entity that implement CapitalSimulator
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CapitalSegment
    CapitalSegment exposes the VaR and the Stress Functionality for a Capital Segment.
    class  CapitalUnit
    CapitalUnit implements the VaR and the Stress Functionality for the specified Capital Unit.
    class  ManagedSegmentL1
    ManagedSegmentL1 implements the VaR and the Stress Functionality inside of the L1 Managed Segment.
    class  ManagedSegmentLn
    ManagedSegmentLn implements the VaR and the Stress Functionality inside of the Ln Managed Segment.
